name: Simisage
author: Kurata So
flavor_text: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.

abilities.name: Monkey Trio
abilities.effect: If you have Simisage, Simisear, and Simipour in play, ignore all {C} Energy in the costs of attacks used by this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Arm Thrust Needle
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon that have an Ability, except any Simisage.
